eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Vermont; AT 10:00 PM ON OCT 15, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:00 AM OCT 16, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a TEST of the State of Vermont Emergency Alert System. No action is required. This is only a TEST. If this was an actual emergency, instructions would follow this message.
